content: doll s need panties to wear under their cute outfits this pattern has instructions for 4 sizes - to suit a range of baby dolls of around 12 14 16 and 18 in length knitted in one piece - these are quick and easy to make requires ~ dk yarn 4mm needles a short length of elastic or ribbon if desired why not make a few of these in a different colours - to match a range of doll s outfits so sweet **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
